description: Dive into "Enchanting Escapes: Romance in Chalong" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Enchanting Escapes: Romance in Chalong

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the heart of Phuket, Chaithararam Temple, also known as Wat Chalong, is a stunning temple complex that dates back to the early 19th century. This sacred site is adorned with intricate Buddha paintings and shimmering golden statues, surrounded by beautifully landscaped gardens that invite tranquility. The temple holds significant historical importance for the local community, particularly due to its association with Luangpho Chaem‚Äîa revered monk known for his mastery in meditation and traditional medicine.

sources.snippet: Some of the most romantic things to do in Phuket are spending a day at Phi Phi Island, visiting Phuket‚Äôs renowned Wat Chalong Temple, viewing the Big Buddha Phuket, and watching the Siam Cabaret Show. The couples can also admire the romantic views of the Promthep Cape or Phang Nga Bay or go on a romantic sightseeing tour of the entire Phuket town. You can also enjoy a speedboat trip to James Bond Island or take a romantic couple spa at the Thai parlors.
sources.shortName: 9 Things To Do In Phuket On Honeymoon For A Romantic Trip!

sources.snippet: This temple is located near Chalong and is the most important of the 29 Buddhust temples in Phuket, it is set in a large area and consists of a main temple and a few other temples in the grounds. Whilst tourists admire the ornate buildings, life for the monks continues with their daily rituals.
sources.shortName: Chalong - Phuket - Thailand

sources.snippet: Wat Chalong, also known as Chaithararam Temple, is a historical landmark and Buddhist temple in Phuket. It is Phuket‚Äôs largest and most visited temple, built at the beginning of the 19th century. The walls and ceiling are decorated with beautiful paintings showcasing the life of Buddha.
sources.shortName: Top 5 Things To Do

sources.snippet: Phuket is home to over 30 Buddhist temples, but this particular one is the most famous and one of the most revered and majestic. Founded in the early 19th century, Wat Chalong was built in honor of two respected monks, Luang Phor Chaem and Luang Phor Chuang, known for their...
sources.shortName: The best places of the Chalong district in Phuket: what to visit

sources.snippet: Another notable temple that you can visit is Wat Chalong ‚Äì the largest and most revered temple according to the locals, built at the beginning of the nineteenth century and dedicated to two highly venerable monks.
sources.shortName: A Couple‚Äôs Getaway Guide to Phuket
Chalong, Phuket

places.name: Wat Chalong

reviews.text:
We took the Phuket city tour and this was one of the places to visit. It is a beautiful and peaceful temple. The main Chalong Temple is built on three floors and there are stunning Buddha statues on each floor. The terrace can also be accessed to enjoy a beautiful view of the temple park.

Don't be surprised when the quiet and austere atmosphere of the temple is interrupted by the loud crackling sound of fire crackers. At Wat Chalong, Phuket's largest Buddhist temple, visitors light these crackers in large clay ovens near the temple's sermon hall as a traditional act of gratitude. The practice stems from a belief in the spiritual power of the temple's former abbots - when prayers are answered, devotees celebrate by igniting strings of firecrackers, their sharp reports echoing across the temple grounds.

There are also some shops and eateries across the temple grounds. I would recommend this place.

This temple is a great spot for tourists-not just for its religious value, but also for its beautiful architecture. I really love how it's located near the hills or mountains. When I parked my scooter at the temple and looked back, I saw the mountain just behind it-it was such a stunning view.

The air there is very fresh, and the area is spacious. You can feed the fish in the pond, which is full of life, and there are also many birds around. I enjoyed playing with the birds-they're very friendly and make for beautiful videos.

I was actually surprised to see so many tourists here, but I believe it's because they also appreciate the stunning architecture and peaceful atmosphere like I do. I think there are around 5 or 6 different temples in this area, each with its own unique style and different Buddha images.

My favorite was the tallest one-you can walk inside, and it has several floors. If I remember correctly, the first floor is filled with many Buddha images. On the second floor, there's a large white Buddha statue. The third floor offers an amazing 360-degree view of the surrounding area. And on the top floor, there's something very special-I'm not sure what it's called, but it seems to be a relic, possibly a tooth of the Buddha. It's interesting to watch people, especially Thai visitors, insert coins or bills as they make wishes or prayers for good luck.

Wat Chalong is one of the most beautiful and spiritually significant temples in Phuket. The temple complex is well-maintained, with stunning architecture that showcases intricate Thai craftsmanship. The main pagoda (Chedi) is especially impressive, as it houses a relic of the Buddha and offers peaceful surroundings for reflection.

The temple grounds are spacious and filled with ornate statues, detailed carvings, and colorful decorations, making it both a cultural and visual delight. Visitors will also notice locals lighting incense and candles, which adds to the authentic spiritual atmosphere.

It's a wonderful place to learn about Thai Buddhist traditions, pay respects, or simply enjoy the serene environment. While it can get busy during peak tourist hours, the atmosphere remains calm and respectful.

Dress modestly when visiting, as it's an active place of worship. Entrance is free, but donations are welcome to help with the temple's upkeep.

Overall, Wat Chalong is a must-visit if you're exploring Phuket-not only for its cultural significance but also for its beauty and tranquility.

places.address: 70 ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏π‡πà‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 6 Chao Fah Tawan Tok Rd, Chalong, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

places.generalDescription: The Big Buddha, officially known as "Phraphutthamingmongkhol-akenagakhiri Buddha," stands majestically at 45 meters tall atop Nakerd Mountain in Phuket. This stunning white marble statue is not only a significant religious site but also offers breathtaking panoramic views of the island, including Phuket Town and Chalong Bay. The journey to this iconic landmark is made easy with well-paved roads, despite some winding curves.

sources.snippet: Some of the most romantic things to do in Phuket are spending a day at Phi Phi Island, visiting Phuket‚Äôs renowned Wat Chalong Temple, viewing the Big Buddha Phuket, and watching the Siam Cabaret Show. The couples can also admire the romantic views of the Promthep Cape or Phang Nga Bay or go on a romantic sightseeing tour of the entire Phuket town. You can also enjoy a speedboat trip to James Bond Island or take a romantic couple spa at the Thai parlors.
sources.shortName: 9 Things To Do In Phuket On Honeymoon For A Romantic Trip!

sources.snippet: Take a trip up the famous Big Buddha Temple that stands tall as a landmark here in Phuket, and take advantage of the panoramic views and scenery overlooking Phuket while you‚Äôre there. Another notable temple that you can visit is Wat Chalong ‚Äì the largest and most revered temple according to the locals, built at the beginning of the nineteenth century and dedicated to two highly venerable monks.
sources.shortName: A Couple‚Äôs Getaway Guide to Phuket

sources.snippet: The Big Buddha is one of Phuket's newest attractions standing 45metres high and situated on top of Nakkerd Hill looking over the south west and southern bays of Chalong, Rawai and Kata. This is an amazing spiritual and respectful place with fantastic views.
sources.shortName: Chalong - Phuket - Thailand

sources.snippet: Phuket Big Buddha is not exactly in Chalong district, but it‚Äôs such an iconic landmark visible everywhere in the south of Phuket. It is close to the famous Wat Chalong and often combined in the tour.
sources.shortName: Chalong, Phuket

places.name: The Big Buddha, Phuket

reviews.text: it is very beautiful place. I recommend for every tourist to travel this place. There is also tiger park and sweety elephanst there. There is hiking and motorcycle tours also. We are walking back inte the beautiful nature trees till tiger park. I recommend.

Viewpoint is so beautiful. Big Buddha is closed right now due to a landslide but you can ride a motorbike up to the top. You can still see The Buddha Statue but you can't enter. Beautiful motorbike ride up there.
Food and drinks served at the top.
Bring Thai baht.

It is still closed when I am visiting it in July 2025. But the view near the Big Budha is really beautiful!!! And it is free. There is like a park for elephants. You can pay if you want to feed the elephants or ride the elephants. But it is better if you choose not to ride the elephants.

places.address: Karon, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Kata Noi Beach, a hidden gem on Phuket's southwest coast, offers an idyllic escape with its stunning white sands and crystal-clear aquamarine waters. Nestled in a serene bay just south of the bustling Karon Beach, this beach is perfect for families seeking relaxation away from the party scene of Patong. The 1.5 km stretch is lined with swaying palm trees that provide shade while vendors offer refreshing drinks and local snacks right at your fingertips.

sources.snippet: Kata Noi beach is a small bay just a short drive from Kata beach, it is a small beach but the scenery is breath taking, take some time to relax, walk along the beautiful sands or maybe go for a swim. From the Kata viewpoint you can look across at the bays of Karon, Kata and Kata Noi, The best time to visit the beach is between November and April as swimming can sometimes become dangerous during the monsoon season.
sources.shortName: 25 Best Things to Do in Phuket (Thailand)

places.name: Kata Noi Beach

reviews.text: Beautiful beach ‚õ±Ô∏è  there where no swimming signs and it was choppy but it seems quite safe if you stay close. Not too crowded and very clean! Would 100% recommend

It is a quiet enough beach, without a lot of entertainment venues. Most often people come to this beach, stay in a hotel and try not to go far away, enjoying a quiet vacation.

The beach is small in size: its length is about 700 meters. In high season there are a lot of tourists here, but compared to the previous beaches: Kata and Karon, there is a place to stay!

Kata Noi beach is quite a famous vacation spot among tourists.

The flora here is made up of trees of mixed species, nevertheless, the beach is open enough to spread the sun's rays. Be sure to use high UV protection creams when sunbathing here.

The sand here is soft, light gray in color. The entrance to the sea is medium deep. The water is clear, blue-green color! The wind in the high season is not strong.

The bulk of vacationing tourists are concentrated at the hotels adjacent to the beach.

Full information with video and easy navigation - in the app üëâ PHUKETON

Kata Noi Beach is a stunning, quiet escape with soft golden sand and crystal-clear water. Less crowded than nearby beaches, it's perfect for swimming, sunbathing, or catching a breathtaking sunset.

Staying at Katathani Phuket Beach Resort makes the experience even better, with direct beachfront access, lush pools, and seaside dining. While the area has limited nightlife, it's ideal for a relaxing getaway.

‚úîÔ∏è Beautiful, clean, and quiet
‚úîÔ∏è Great swimming & incredible sunsets
‚úîÔ∏è Best enjoyed from Katathani Resort

‚ùå Few dining options nearby but couple very good options (BlueShark)
‚ùå Can be wavy in monsoon season when the waves/swell are coming from the west.

‚≠ê 5/5 ‚Äì Perfect for those seeking tranquility!

places.address: Karon, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Monkey Hill Viewpoint, also known as Toh Sae Hill, is a forested hilltop in Phuket Old Town that offers panoramic views of the city. Visitors can purchase seeds and nuts to feed the roaming monkeys and enjoy the stunning sights from the observation platform. It's best to visit in the early morning or evening to avoid strong sun, and be cautious with belongings around the friendly macaques. The hill also features a shrine popular for seeking lucky lottery numbers.

sources.snippet: Also known as Toh Sae Hill, Monkey Hill is the highest hill in Phuket Town, there are about 400 macaques living on the hill and they live in little groups all over the hill. The monkeys are not know to attack humans but it you should keep an eye on your belongings. The bottom of the hill houses a shrine that is popular with Thai people, a lot of whom come here to ask for lucky lottery numbers, the shrine is in honour of three different holy spirits, Toh Sae Dang, Toh Sae Dam and Toh Sae Kaow.
sources.shortName: 25 Best Things to Do in Phuket (Thailand)

sources.snippet: You'll meet dogs, goats, chicken, and beautiful view but also, of course, a lot of monkeys.There are also a few view points where you can stop and enjoy the scenery. Be careful with them especially when feeding them the banana. free.it's best to visit in the morning around 9 or 10 AM (as recommended by our driver) as the monkeys tend to feed around that time before sleeping in the afternoon.'
sources.shortName: 35 Things To Do In Phuket On Honeymoon: Get Upto 30% Off
Have a Love Affair with Phuket on a Romantic Thai Vacation

places.name: Monkey Hill Viewpoint

reviews.text:
Such a cool experience, especially seeing the monkeys-there were so many, and the baby ones were absolutely adorable! Even though we didn't climb all the way up since it wasn't too hot, the monkeys are all over the place, so it was still totally worth the visit.
Only on the way out did we realize you could rent them to take you with a scooter or taxi to the top-I wish that had been made clearer or offered at the entrance. That would have made the visit even better.
Overall, a fun and unique spot, definitely worth checking out!

This is a must see if you're in the area. Great views and lots of monkeys. Just don't get too close to the animals and don't bring food with you. If you bring water, keep it out of site of the monkeys.
You can purchase beverages and at the top and bottom of the hill. All the vendors were very nice and welcoming.

Nice trail with lots of old trees along the way to fill your lung with fresh air. Walk uphill till the view point but it's really an easy trail. The view point offers just average panoramic view to my liking probably because it was cloudy. It was fun to observe the monkeys' behavior from afar. Just beware of the monkeys as you walk. They did stop me as I walked by (I had a backpack but no foods) but not in an aggressive way. Walk calmly to the other side if they stop you, not make eyes contact, prepare rocks or a stick just in case work for me. Don't bring foods or if you do just to have some fun, be prepared to protect yourselves. I saw a group of group of terrified/fun seeking tourists bringing foods not knowing how to get rid of a huge monkey stealing their foods and blocking the way.

places.address: Ratsada, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Soha Cuisine Phuket Restaurant is a highly recommended halal restaurant in Phuket, offering a great variety of delicious and authentic Thai dishes. The food is flavorful with good portions and reasonable prices, making it a favorite among visitors. The ambience is nicely decorated, suitable for diners of all ages. One must-try dish is the cheesecake, which many have raved about as the best they've ever had.

sources.snippet: Soha Cuisine is the perfect place for lovers of halal Thai cuisine in Phuket. Located in the Chalong area, the restaurant offers guests a wide range of both Thai and Western cuisine in a charming atmosphere with a choice of seating in a cozy air-conditioned room or outdoors.
sources.shortName: The best places of the Chalong district in Phuket: what to visit

places.name: Soha Cuisine Phuket Restaurant

reviews.text:
The restaurant serves Halal Thai and Pakistani cuisines.

The restaurant has a nice ambience.

The staff were very well mannered and professional. Once all the food was served,  they checked in on you to see if the food was ok and if they can be of further assistance.

The owner was a very friendly lady and we had a lovely chat with her. ‚ù§Ô∏è

The food was delicious and we had:

Thai Fried Chicken - 9/10
Fried Red Snapper with Thai chilli sauce - 10/10 üëçüèæüëçüèæüëçüèæüëçüèæüëçüèæ

Thai mixed vegetables - 9/10
Carbonara pasta - 8/10
Vegetable samosa - 7/10
Iced Cocoa - 9/10

Orange juice 8/10 (How can you go wrong with OJ right üòÇ)
Milo - 9/10 (Good rating because it is yummy and served Cappuccino style üòÄüëçüèæ)

I would like to extend my heartfelt thanks to Soha Cuisine for the delicious food and outstanding service. Every dish was full of flavor and prepared with great care. The staff was friendly, attentive, and made us feel truly welcome.

Thank you for a wonderful dining experience ‚Äì I'll definitely be coming back!

The place is very clean , positive energies , the staff is very kind , and the food is too much delicious , for Muslims the restaurant are HALLALLüíö
I enjoyed the food , and the lasso too it was very refreshing

places.generalDescription: NARA MASSAGE is a professional massage spa that offers high-quality massage services at reasonable prices. The spa is clean and cozy, with friendly and helpful staff. The massage services offered are excellent, and the prices are very reasonable. I would recommend NARA MASSAGE to anyone looking for a relaxing massage experience.

sources.snippet: A three-storey salon with pleasant surroundings, but not a biting price. During the session you forget about everything and disconnect from reality, and strong, gentle and sensual hands of masseurs help to relax all muscles of the body and relieve tension and clamps. After the massage you feel lightness and...
sources.shortName: The best places of the Chalong district in Phuket: what to visit

sources.snippet: For a clean environment at an affordable price, you can consider NARA Massage and Spa. Certified by SHA Plus+ (Amazing Thailand Safety & Health Administration) with 100% of their staff fully vaccinated, you can be assured of your health, on top of a relaxing time.
sources.shortName: A Couple‚Äôs Getaway Guide to Phuket

places.name: NARA MASSAGE & SPA PHUKET (Chalong, Patak Rd.)

reviews.text:
I had such a relaxing and rejuvenating time at Nara Massage & Spa. From the moment I walked in, the staff were warm, welcoming, and professional. The atmosphere was calm and beautifully decorated, with soothing music and a clean, cozy environment that immediately helped me unwind.

I chose a [Thai massage & aromatherapy oil massage] and the therapist was absolutely amazing - attentive, gentle, and skilled. She made sure I was comfortable throughout the session and really focused on the areas I needed most. I felt the tension melt away!

The prices were very reasonable for the quality of service, and I really appreciated the little touches like the hot tea afterward.

If you're looking for a peaceful escape and excellent massage in a clean and relaxing space, I highly recommend Nara Massage & Spa. I'll definitely be coming back again!

We have been coming here for massages for a whole year, and every time we are absolutely delighted. We usually take the Thai massage + foot massage for 90 minutes - after it, you always feel completely relaxed and refreshed. The atmosphere is calm, and the therapists are very attentive and professional. Every time I get so relaxed that I fall asleep during the session. Thank you for consistently providing such a high level of service!

The place is outstanding and the workers are highly professional, from the the reservation to the reception and service and the warm hospitality. They offer many types of messages for anyones preference and the therapist are very professional and have knowledge of what they're doing. In addition they ask you for specific parts to focus their attention on regarding the body. Moreover, thier prices are reasonable compared to the quality of the massage and to other competitors. Highly recommended.

places.address: 75, 159 Patak Rd, Chalong, Mueang Phuket District, Chang Wat Phuket 83130, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled on the stunning Kata Beach with breathtaking views of the Andaman Sea and lush Thai forests, Mom Tri's Kitchen is a renowned dining destination in Phuket. The restaurant offers a blend of modern and traditional Thai dishes paired with creative cocktails crafted by expert mixologists. Whether it's a romantic date night or a special dinner, this elegant establishment provides an unforgettable experience.

sources.snippet: Sitting in a property formally owned by the Thai royal family is Mom Tri‚Äôs Kitchen, a paradise for couples looking to enjoy a romantic meal. The restaurant is situated right on the waterfront overlooking the Andaman Sea and the white sand of the Kata Noi Beach. With over 700 wines to choose by the bottle and 18 to choose by the glass they leave no taste buds left wanting.
sources.shortName: 25 Best Things to Do in Phuket (Thailand)

places.name: Mom Tri's Kitchen

reviews.text: Dine with a splendid view, this place did have a vibe of its own that made our group feel very calm and relaxed. Great menu to choose from and their cocktail list was quite amazing! The staff were very courteous we had a great time for a family dinner and were almost glued to our seats and not wanting to leave even after our dinner. Highly recommend this place if you like to spend some quiet time with your favourite people over some good food and drinks.

Had the most amazing experience coming here with my partner for our anniversary dinner. The staff were welcoming and very attentive. The food was tasty , it was absolutely incredible! The drinks were lovely! And finally the view, even during monsoon season was stunning! (we were lucky tonight as it was pouring all day) 10/10 highly recommended.

Incredible is the best way to describe this experience, hands down one of the best restaurants I have ever been to. The view is to die for and the food is nothing short of that. Service was super friendly and accomodating, thank you to the beautiful wait staff and kitchen staff for giving us such a beautiful experience. We will definitely be back!! üíï‚ú®

places.address: R75W+XVH, Karon, Mueang, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

places.generalDescription: The Green Man Pub, located between Kata and Chalong in Phuket, offers a traditional English Tudor style experience with a wide range of menu options including breakfast, pub favorites, bar snacks, vegetarian and Indian dishes. On Sundays, they serve traditional roasts. The pub hosts a Pub Quiz every Thursday night and special events during the holiday season.

sources.snippet: A family style restaurant and pub.The kitchen serves breakfast, lunch and dinner items. International, Thai food and of course pub food are available - something for everyone's liking. The venue has a wine cellar and cigar room for the adults and a playground for the children.
sources.shortName: Chalong - Phuket - Thailand

places.name: The Green Man Pub

reviews.text:
It's just 100/100!
You guys created such an awesome place! Everything is beautiful and everyone was so kind.
The atmosphere is like you are in the castle from the Game of Thrones. Just WOW!
The food was awesome, and special thanks for the Guinness.
Service was great. Hugs and love!
And the dog named Lucky, you are the king! I will come back for sure ‚ô•Ô∏è

Very atmospheric place! looks like a real German pub, but the choice of beer from the barrel is not very wide, although the IPA is quite good.

The choice of food is quite wide, it is cooked quickly and tasty. Live music plays in the evenings.

A great place to come and sit alone or with friends. there is also a beautiful courtyard and a paddle court nearby.

Chef Wasabi greets guests

Great traditional western food .It actually has a great pub feel about it . Very Tudor looking.If your English or just a westerner in general and missing home defo look this place up..and they look after thier Guinness apparently but don't drink it myself .

places.address: 82, 15 Patak Rd, Rawai, Muang, Phuket 83130, Thailand

places.generalDescription: If you're looking to dive into the vibrant spirit of Phuket, The Distillery Phuket - Home of Chalong Bay is a must-visit destination. This award-winning rum distillery offers an immersive experience where you can witness the fascinating process of rum production, from sugarcane pressing to fermentation and distillation. Made entirely from 100% natural Thai sugarcane grown without harmful chemicals, Chalong Bay's artisan rum stands out for its purity and quality.

sources.snippet: There is a rum factory here, where you can take a tasting tour, cocktail making workshops, and an open-air bar-restaurant with delicious drinks and tapas. There are some of the cutest kitties living on the grounds üôÇ The restaurant itself specializes in Thai and Western cuisine. The food is delicious!
sources.shortName: The best places of the Chalong district in Phuket: what to visit

sources.snippet: Learn more about one of Phuket‚Äôs finest local spirits made at the award-winning Chalong Bay Distillery. Featuring Thai sugarcane as its prime ingredient, you‚Äôll get to visit and discover the distillery‚Äôs interesting history as well as taste its first-rate artisanal rum.
sources.shortName: 14 Best Activities for Couples and Honeymooners in Phuket -

sources.snippet: Chalong Bay Rum is a small but well-known factory preparing an excellent local rum with sugar cane juice. You can visit the factory, try some rum tasting, and enjoy their excellent and beautiful open-air tropical restaurant.
sources.shortName: Chalong, Phuket

sources.snippet: Who would have thought that Phuket could produce one of the rarest, most sought-after rums in the world?. Visit Phuket‚Äôs first and only distillery and get behind the scenes to learn how the rum is produced.
sources.shortName: A Couple‚Äôs Getaway Guide to Phuket

places.name: The Distillery Phuket - Home of Chalong Bay

reviews.text: It was amazing!!! I have attended a rum mixing class and a distillery tour. The hosts were so friendly. The cocktails were amazing!!!! The atmosphere was good. Not crowded by the time I visited at 14:00. Would go back most definitely!

I went to a distillery tour and tasting. for 590baht you simply cannot get any better deal. The staff were friendly, kind and knowledgeable and gave a great tour.
The tasting session was also incredible. I got to try all of the varieties of rum, gin and vodka they make there. The venue itself is stunning and an absolute must for a date.
The food was terrific as well. Outstanding flavours coupled with exquisite presentation. Get yourself down there and get a taste of real Phuket!

A Spirited Surprise at Phuket Distillery ‚Äì Cheers to Local Flavor!

One of the unexpected highlights of my trip to Phuket was visiting Phuket Distillery ‚Äì a hidden gem that delivers a truly authentic and enjoyable experience.

The team there is incredibly welcoming and passionate about their craft. The tour was both informative and fun, offering a behind-the-scenes look at how they produce their high-quality spirits. What really stood out is that their rum is made directly from fresh Thai sugarcane ‚Äì not molasses ‚Äì which gives it such a clean, smooth, and distinctive flavor.

The tasting session was the cherry on top! Each variety had its own unique character, and awards winning.  A lot of love and care goes into every step of their process.

If you're looking to do something a little different in Phuket ‚Äì something local, laid-back, and delicious ‚Äì this distillery is definitely worth the stop. A great way to sip your way through some Thai craftsmanship!

places.address: 14, 2 Soi Palai, Chalong, Amphur Muang, Phuket 83130, Thailand

places.generalDescription: If you're looking to indulge in the ultimate luxury experience while exploring the stunning west coast of Thailand, look no further than Sweet Dreamers Yacht Charters. Chartering a yacht with them allows you to enjoy the breathtaking Andaman Sea at your own pace, offering unparalleled comfort and flexibility. Picture yourself aboard one of their exquisite yachts, sipping chilled wine and savoring delectable seafood prepared by an onboard chef as you take in Phuket's mesmerizing landscapes.

sources.snippet: Chartering a yacht in Phuket is one of the most luxurious ways to experience the west coast of Thailand and the beautiful waters of the Andaman. The yacht charter option provides flexibility and comfort. A number of yachts are available for charter on the island.
sources.shortName: Chalong - Phuket - Thailand

sources.snippet: Nothing spells luxury more than an afternoon on  Phuket private yacht charters. Marvel at Phuket‚Äôs stunning sea and landscape while sipping freshly-chilled wine and feasting on sumptuous seafood courtesy of the yacht‚Äôs in-house chef and crew.
sources.shortName: 14 Best Activities for Couples and Honeymooners in Phuket -

places.name: Sweet Dreamers Yacht Charters

reviews.text:
I am so happy to see that Sweet Dreamers Yacht Charters have a Google listing because finally it has allowed me to share the highlight of our 2012 Phuket trip and whilst it was quite awhile ago, this wonderful memory and experience created by Captain Igor Lofing and the team at Sweet Dreamers has caused this life event to be burnt into our memories.

This was our day trip with Sweet Dreamers sailing tours on board their yacht the SY Nadezhda. OMG is what i have to say, surprises from start to finish! Our host and Captain the fantastic Igor Lofing was just excellent, he was informative, funny and so very charismatic!

This impressive sailing tour business is operated by Igor and his partner Delphine. The yacht was very intimate, with just 5 people on board. On the day we met the most delighful people from Germany on board and the whole day was fun filled, heaps of swimming and snorkeling in some of the best open yet safe waters at Coral Island and some other islands inbetween.

We got up close to heaps of marine life from starfish to every coloured fish imaginable. I can safely say and without any reservations, you WILL have a blast. One of the best travel experiences we have ever enjoyed!

So if you are ever in Phuket and looking for an exciting day out, then Sweet Dreamers sailing tours is THE answer for memories that will last a lifetime!

Indescribable journey. Wonderful captain. Memorable experience. I hired Igor for an overnight trip with my wife and it was the most amazing experience. I cannot recommend Igor and Sweet Dreamers more. When I go back to Thailand, Sweet Dreamers will be my go to contact for a re-run of that beautiful time that I will never forget. Thank you Igor!!!

We had an amazing sailing trip around Phuket organized by Igor for our family, including my husband and toddler. From start to finish, communication was outstanding-clear, timely, and very helpful. Igor's attention to detail made the whole experience smooth and stress-free. Our skipper was fantastic, ensuring a safe and enjoyable journey, and the cook's meals were absolutely exceptional. This trip exceeded all our expectations. I definitely recommend Igor and the charter company to anyone looking for a perfect sailing adventure in Phuket!

places.address: 9/44 Parkview Moo 9 T. Chalong, A. Muang 83130, ‡∏ï‡∏≥‡∏ö‡∏• ‡∏â‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏á, Chalong, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the serene surroundings of Phuket, Orchid Pool Villa offers an idyllic retreat for those seeking a blend of relaxation and adventure. Just a stone's throw from the stunning Nai Harn Beach, this villa is perfect for couples on their honeymoon or families looking to unwind together. With its spacious layout, guests can enjoy both communal gatherings and private moments. The indoor pool and karaoke room provide endless entertainment during evenings spent at home.

sources.snippet: Nai Harn beach: Nai Harn beach is one of most sought after tourist attractions for amazing things to do in Phuket on Honeymoon. For couples looking for less crowded, and private moments, this place is the best choice. The beach has some local restaurants, fun and engaging water sport activities, and picturesque views.
sources.shortName: 35 Things To Do In Phuket On Honeymoon: Get Upto 30% Off

places.name: Orchid Pool Villa Phuket

reviews.text: We loved staying in this villa. The indoor pool and karaoke room were great fun in the evenings. The villa is huge, plenty of room for getting together and also retreating for some peace and quiet if required. Tom the host was marvellous and  could not do enough for us. Highly recommend this place if you are visiting Phuket.
Experience a peaceful and comfortable stay in this lovely accommodation. Good swimming pool and bedrooms. Overall, it's an excellent choice for your stay and highly recommended.

(Translated by Google) The accommodation is beautiful and very clean. The service staff is very good. Suitable for families to relax together, very private. Recommended for many families to use the service.

(Original)

places.address: 9/110 - 9/115, Ratsada, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

places.generalDescription: The Saeng Tham Shrine, also known as the ÂÆöÂÖâÂ†Ç, is a stunning place of worship that was established by one of the ancestors of the Tantaves Family. This Chinese temple in Old Phuket Town exhibits unique architectural features commonly seen in Hokkien-Chinese shrines, including a roof with an upward-curving ridge shape and vibrant sculpture decorations.

sources.snippet: The Shrine of the Serene Light (Sangtham Shrine) used to be ‚Äòthe little hidden Chinese temple‚Äô hidden right under your nose on Phang Nga road, one of the most popular street of Phuket Town. While most Thais knew all about it, only a few foreigners would be aware of its existence and proudly whisper its secret location to newbies like an old secret passage to some mystic temple. The altar is always fresh with flowers and burning candles.
sources.shortName: 35 Things To Do In Phuket On Honeymoon: Get Upto 30% Off

places.name: San Chao Saengtham

reviews.text: If you like to pay attention to detail, then this is a place you can visit. A small shrine full of vibrant colours.
The shrine is very near Museum Phuket and the Soi Romanee. Peaceful and beautiful shrine. Free entry and you can explore in a short time when you are here in the Phuket Old town.

Hidden from prying eyes by a long and narrow corridor, guarded by powerful white lions, from the street, this temple can only be noticed by a large, beautiful structure by the road of a pleasant, purple color, decorated with Chinese lanterns and amazing stucco dragons on the pillars!

The narrow corridor itself, which leads to the main building, can be considered a small work of art. Everything is very beautiful and green here, and on the sides, visitors are greeted by beautiful statues, sacred hieroglyphs and other signs and elements of Chinese mythology.

This temple is definitely worth visiting while on vacation in Phuket. Here you can have a pleasant and useful time, walk, sort out your thoughts and take a large number of original and interesting photos!

Full information with video and easy navigation - in the üëâ PHUKETON application

places.address: V9MQ+G5R, Phangnga Rd, Talat Yai, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Kan Eang 2 Seafood is a popular dining spot located in Chalong Bay, offering a casual waterfront experience with a wide range of Thai seafood dishes. The restaurant provides a spacious outdoor dining area by the beach, making it suitable for families and large groups to enjoy uninterrupted ocean views and cooling sea breezes. With its sand-floored setting, Kan Eang 2 Seafood offers an authentic Thai culinary experience with freshly prepared dishes and authentic flavors.

sources.snippet: Kan Eang 2, as the name indicates, is the sister of Kan Eang @ Pier, but in a less fancy and less expensive version. The seafood is very good, and the setting is attractive and more casual in a good way.
sources.shortName: Chalong, Phuket

places.name: ‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏á 2 Kan Eang 2 Seafood

reviews.text:
Amazing food and beautiful views!

Kan Eang 2 Seafood is a fantastic restaurant with delicious food and an incredibly beautiful view. The food is fresh and tasty, especially their seafood dishes, which really impress. The service is friendly and attentive, which makes the experience even better. The atmosphere is relaxed and cozy, perfect for both couples and families. Definitely recommended if you want to enjoy a good dinner in beautiful surroundings!
This place is well positioned along the beach.   It has live seafood and other Thai favorites.   The staff is professional and efficient.   Overall, a good place to dine.

The best Thai green curry I have ever had! So many layers of local herbal ingredients like a firework released in my mouth. The staff are super friendly and can speak good level of English. One of them even show me the leaf they put in the green curry which tasted like lemon. The price is gentle to your pocket too. I feel like paying street vendor price for a 5-star dinning experience by the sea. Very happy!

places.address: 9, 3 E Chaofah Rd, Chalong, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83130, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled within the luxurious Kata Rocks Resort in Phuket, The Kata Rocks Clubhouse is a renowned dining venue that offers a blend of Mediterranean and Thai cuisine. With its all-white Greek-inspired ambiance and stunning oceanfront views, this poolside restaurant provides an exquisite culinary experience. The menu features seasonally inspired Mediterranean dishes with regional gourmet touches and a Spanish flair.

sources.snippet: Dine on the Rocks at Kata Rocks is easily one of the most romantic dinners on Phuket. Enjoy a beautiful sunset multi-course dinner full of delicious tapas, fresh local seafood, authentic Mediterranean fare and divine desserts. As you gaze out onto the Andaman from your table set on beautiful rock formations, you are able to enjoy the sounds of the surf and a completely private dining experience with your love.
sources.shortName: 8 Romantic Restaurants in Phuket & Ideas

places.name: The Kata Rocks Clubhouse

reviews.text: Beautiful location overlooking the sea. High end western prices but view and service worth every penny. Treat yourself to this amazing experience

Was expecting great food & service for the amount paid. But unfortunately it was a disappointment.  Really need to look into your food quality Kata Rocks. Reduce your minimum spends or increase the quality of your food.

Dry & tasteless pizza 0/10
Factory tasting super spicy crab cake 1/10
Lobster spaghetti...poor taste 2/10
Scallops see for yourself  0/10

The pool also overrun with loud annoying young men ratio 20 to 1 to ladies. Maybe you should consider couples only day use. Service slow, not on par for 5 star hotel with these room rates. View & pool/ facilities cleanliness saved the day for the 2 stars. Also no DJ all day (so far at 4pm) and day use guests playing annoying music on their personal speakers. Not recommended

If you are looking for a pool brunch with great view, here is the answer.

Sashimi and Lobsters are fresh and many foods look great, unfortunately I could eat just a bit üòÜ

However, steak sauce is quite disappoint for me that the taste if ketchup that mixed for a sauce too strong ü•π

Staffs all have great Service mind.

Come back for sure if I have time üòÅ

places.address: 186, 22 Kok Tanode Road, Tambon Karon, Mueng, Phuket 83100, Thailand
